mapper.insert: insert into course (name, score, capacity, selected_num, version, start_time, end_time, week_day, section_time) values (#{name}, #{score}, #{capacity}, 0, 1, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{weekDay}, #{sectionTime})
mapper.select: select * from course order by id desc
mapper.update: update course set selected_num = selected_num - 1 where id = #{id} and selected_num > 0
update course set selected_num = selected_num + 1 where id = #{id} and selected_num < capacity
